nodes.text: The Flotation Shelter was a model of ocean survival raft manufactured by Valerenn Environmentals. Designed to keep the crew of a starship alive in the event of a water landing, the Flotation Shelter contained enough supplies to support two people for at least two weeks. The shelter inflated, with support struts forming a di-chrome shelter. Supplies included a homing beacon with a range of four light-years, two weeks rations, a glowrod, six meters of syntherope, two medpacs, and a large container of fresh water.
